title: (x) Black sans on "Donkey Punch" movie poster - Arial {Jazzy B}
content:
I thought this might be franklin Gothic heavy, but the ’G’ aren’t the same and this font seems more extended. Can anyone help me out?

Cheers

Steve

comments.content: Arial Black - beat my to it Jazzy ;)
